tagline: From vision board to punch list — renovation planning with honest budgets and realistic timelines
pros: Scope clarity prevents costly creep and surprises
Realistic budgeting with mandatory contingency buffers
Bridges communication gap between homeowners and contractors
cons: Planning-heavy approach may feel slow for eager renovators
Can't replace architects or structural engineers for complex work
Not useful for minor maintenance — that's a different role

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
